titleStmt.title: Englands vvarning-piece; or, A caviet for wicked sinners to remember their latter end To the tune of the Rich merchant man.

notesStmt.note: Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives a range of dates: 1641-1674.
O copy, reel 2443, is cropped at foot affecting imprint and text.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
